text: 27|49|Sihamte ka’le, ‘tomaloke parasparae allahara sapata grahana karaa, ami raatira bhitarate sesa karai dima te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka; tara pichata te'omra abhibharakaka niscita hicape kama ye, te'omra paraiyalabargara hatya ami pratyaksa karaa nachilo, arau niscaya ami satyabadi’.
